cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.4)


list(APPEND CMAKE_MODULE_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../../../../../cmake")
include(Reprojucer)


if(NOT DEFINED UnitTestRunner_jucer_FILE)
  message(FATAL_ERROR "UnitTestRunner_jucer_FILE must be defined")
endif()

get_filename_component(UnitTestRunner_jucer_FILE
  "${UnitTestRunner_jucer_FILE}" ABSOLUTE
  BASE_DIR "${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}"
)

if(NOT EXISTS "${UnitTestRunner_jucer_FILE}")
  message(FATAL_ERROR "No such file: ${UnitTestRunner_jucer_FILE}")
endif()

get_filename_component(UnitTestRunner_jucer_DIR
  "${UnitTestRunner_jucer_FILE}" DIRECTORY
)

)
